data.title: Mid FLASH/DRIVE Variations From Mail And Ropes
data.description: Here are some aggressive flashes you can use to contest for Mid control, it is recommended that you coordinate this with your teammates to get maximum value out of it.

data.title: B Heaven to B Main ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for B Main to suppress enemies and stop a B Site push.

data.title: A Tower to A Main ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good A Main ZERO/POINT for getting early info in the round and suppressing your opponents.
